data.subject: Lips
data.lyric:
MY NAME ON YOUR LIPS
 YOUR AIR IN MY LUNGS
 DROWNED IN OXYGEN
 NOW YOU’VE SET THE SCENE
 HIGH ON INT

data.subject: Say Something Loving
data.lyric:
SAY SOMETHING LOVING
 I JUST DON’T REMEMBER 
 THE THRILL OF AFFECTION
 I JUST DON’T REMEMBER
 SAY SO

data.subject: Dangerous
data.lyric:
THEY SAY WE’RE IN DANGER
 BUT I DISAGREE
 IF PROVEN WRONG
 SHAME ON ME
 BUT YOU’VE HAD FAITH IN ME
